title: Weather Forecast API
description: This is one of the courses that leads you to the first AWS Associate certification...

title: Stock Market Data API
description: API delivering real-time stock prices, company information, and market indices. Perfect for building financial tracking Android apps.

title: Exercise Recognition API
description: Uses device sensors to identify and track physical activities like running, cycling, or weight training. Ideal for fitness apps.

title: Augmented Reality Places API
description: Returns AR markers and information about nearby points of interest. Works with Android ARCore for immersive experiences.

title: Language Translation API
description: Perform real-time text translation between 100+ languages without internet connection using ML models optimized for Android.
